data.author: Donald Trump
data.quote: I'm a bit of a P. T. Barnum. I make stars out of everyone.

data.author: St. Jerome
data.quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.

data.author: George Soros
data.quote: When it comes to social consequences, they've got all different people acting in different ways, very difficult to even have a proper criterion of success. So, it's a difficult task.

data.author: Danny Thomas
data.quote: All of us are born for a reason, but all of us don't discover why. Success in life has nothing to do with what you gain in life or accomplish for yourself. It's what you do for others.

data.author: Pele
data.quote: Sport is something that is very inspirational for young people.

data.author: Nigel Farage
data.quote: When people stand up and talk about the great success that the EU has been, I'm not sure anybody saying it really believes it themselves anymore.

data.author: Kevyn Aucoin
data.quote: Today I choose life. Every morning when I wake up I can choose joy, happiness, negativity, pain... To feel the freedom that comes from being able to continue to make mistakes and choices - today I choose to feel life, not to deny my humanity but embrace it.

data.author: Harold S. Geneen
data.quote: The five essential entrepreneurial skills for success: Concentration, Discrimination, Organization, Innovation and Communication.

data.author: Emily Dickinson
data.quote: Fortune befriends the bold.

data.author: Sharon Begley
data.quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.

data.author: Lauren Conrad
data.quote: There is never just one thing that leads to success for anyone. I feel it always a combination of passion, dedication, hard work, and being in the right place at the right time.

data.author: Denis Waitley
data.quote: Learn from the past, set vivid, detailed goals for the future, and live in the only moment of time over which you have any control: now.

data.author: Fran Lebowitz
data.quote: Success didn't spoil me, I've always been insufferable.

data.author: Cicely Tyson
data.quote: You never know what motivates you.

data.author: Walter Elliot
data.quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.

data.author: Bill Gates
data.quote: It's fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.

data.author: Jessye Norman
data.quote: One needs more than ambition and talent to make a success of anything, really. There must be love and a vocation.

data.author: Henry Kissinger
data.quote: Each success only buys an admission ticket to a more difficult problem.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
